title: T3 Ty Cobb PSA Auth for trade for 48 B Berra, 49 B Snider, 57 T Russell, 58 T Bobby Hull
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T3 Ty Cobb PSA Auth for trade for 48 B Berra, 49 B Snider, 57 T Russell, 58 T Bobby Hull
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Navarro
I've received a few $$$$ offers on my T3 Ty Cobb, but nothing that has moved me to sell it.  Have it listed on ebay as well and if it sells, of course I won't have it to trade.  If I can find a trade though, I'll kill the ebay listing.   Card is crummy condition as you can see.   

Let's try the trade route as there are some cards that I need in order to get them signed for my HOF signed rookie collection.     The following are the ones that I need and I will entertain trade proposals concerning them individually and/or in combination depending on condition.  I prefer multiple ones in low grade as opposed to one higher grade example. 

1948 Bowman Yogi Berra
1949 Bowman Duke Snider
1957 Topps Bill Russell
1958 Topps Bobby Hull

Here's the T3 Cobb,
 
[IMG][IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2u77hgo.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]
[IMG][IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2ii9wuo.jpg[/IMG][/IMG] 

Take care,
Mike
